CatDescriptText: Mrs. Ella Cavada, 3714 Parkview Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that 18-year-olds should be given the privilege of voting?" answer reads: "Yes, I think so. I think if they vote they will find out a lot of things which they should know and, therefore, think a little more."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Ella Cavada wearing short sleeved dress with lace trim, beaded necklace, and eyeglasses, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
